page.title: 11Social Life in Stamford Br.
page.content: In our village we have entertainment by our local Drama Groups.They put on plays and musical evenings.There is an adult group and a young folks group of drama players.There is also a company from York Theatre Royal who bring their productions to our village hall for fund raising.There are school dances at the sport centre and discos for the teenagers and children.Every year at christmas we have a school dance.There are concerts by the school choir and orchestra.There is also a school opera.This year it was called 'Smike'.We have pop groups in the village.One of them is called Glass and Rachel Triffitt's cousin plays the guitar in the group.
